seo: 网康,弱口令检测,CNVD-2016-08603,漏洞检测,ns-icg
summary: 该插件用于检测网康互联网控制网关（ns-icg）是否存在默认弱口令漏洞（CNVD-2016-08603），通过模拟登录请求判断目标系统是否受影响。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the Netentsec Internet Control Gateway (ns-icg) has a default weak password vulnerability (CNVD-2016-08603), and determines if the target system is affected by simulating login requests.
